is a net positive." Turning to the bigger picture, Eric Schmidt collects his thoughts for a moment. "I can only describe this now as a "wow" moment," he says. For me this is the beginning of the real revolution in information. "You need never be lonely, you need never be bored. It is a remarkable change that has not been led by and is not just for the Western elites- it is all-pervasive with a declining cost. "We are just at the beginning of hearing the voices who are starting to come online. I feel that we have made a material change in the lives of literally billions of people. The convergence of search, location and social is the next big narrative.
